boolean-expressions-validation.commit_message: Add validation tests for boolean expressions
Upgrade Eclipse JDT Formatter to 4.28 and spotless-maven-plugin to 2.37.0 (#1493)

Upgrade ECJ to 3.34.0 (#1482)

It requires Java 17 and thus transitively our build should require it too.

Remove unused parts of configuration for AppVeyor (#1483)

* Nowadays AppVeyor sets `M2_HOME` pointing on preinstalled Maven,
  so the execution of downloaded `apache-maven-3.3.9\bin\mvn`
  actually leads to the execution of preinstalled.

* Also `mvn` uses `JAVA_HOME`, so its addition to `PATH` is
  not needed.
Add filter for exhaustive switch expression (#1472)
Add test to catch cases when compilers generate wrong line numbers (#1476)

Move validation tests from Java 20 preview to Java 21 (#1478)

Record patterns and pattern matching for switch are finalized in Java 21,
so no need to test them as preview features in earlier versions.
Add experimental support for Java 22 class files (#1479)

Maven 3.9.2 should not produce warnings for jacoco-maven-plugin (#1468)

Note that `org.apache.maven.shared:file-management` version `3.1.0`
requires Java 8.

Upgrade buildnumber-maven-plugin to 3.1.0 (#1467)

It requires Maven 3.5.4 and thus transitively our build should require it too.

Update validation test in accordance with JEP 440 (#1448)

Quoting https://openjdk.org/jeps/440

> Apart from some minor editorial changes, the main change since the
> second preview is to remove support for record patterns appearing in
> the header of an enhanced for statement.

Fix generation of `Eclipse-SourceReference` entry in `MANIFEST.MF` (#1454)

This change fixes flaws of
4dc8b3855c82c868d7756944519c90d4326913da
and
740c51fd74934ea7549383984f21e8ffe3dc2910
i.e. `build.commitId` is correctly computed
and tests can be executed in IntelliJ IDEA.
Add safety slot before variable for probe array (#893)

Fix execution of tests in IntelliJ IDEA (#1437)

Prior to this change execution of some tests in IntelliJ IDEA 2022.3.3
fails with `ExceptionInInitializerError`

```
Caused by: java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 7
    at java.lang.String.substring(String.java:1963)
    at org.jacoco.core.JaCoCo.<clinit>(JaCoCo.java:44)
```

because build of the project in IntelliJ IDEA produces following
`org.jacoco.core/target/classes/org/jacoco/core/jacoco.properties`

```
VERSION=${qualified.bundle.version}
COMMITID=
HOMEURL=http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco
RUNTIMEPACKAGE=${jacoco.runtime.package.name}
```

after this change produces

```
VERSION=${qualified.bundle.version}
COMMITID=0000000
HOMEURL=http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco
RUNTIMEPACKAGE=${jacoco.runtime.package.name}
```

and tests pass.
Fix build for JDK 21 EA b21 (#1433)
AgentModule should set ProtectionDomain when defining classes (#1425)
Add validation test for JEP 432: Record Patterns (#1415)

Agent should not open `java.lang` package to unnamed module of the application class loader (#1334)

Co-authored-by: Evgeny Mandrikov <mandrikov@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Marc R. Hoffmann <hoffmann@mountainminds.com>

Upgrade spotless-maven-plugin to 2.35.0 and Eclipse JDT Formatter to 4.27 (#1414)

This allows format checking of the integration test targets up to Java 20.
Require at least JDK 11 for the build (#1413)

Upgrade ECJ from 3.12.1 to 3.32.0 (#1404)

Version `4.6.1` of previously used artifact `org.eclipse.jdt:ecj`
was actually version of Eclipse IDE.

This version supports source/target from Java 1.1 up to 19.

Also note that starting from version `3.27.0` ECJ requires Java 11
for execution.
Add validation test for JEP 433: Pattern Matching for switch (#1191)
Both `-Djdk.version=5` and `-Dbytecode.version=5` are required when using JDK >= 9 for Maven
Support targeting JDK 5 when using JDK >= 9 for Maven (#1398)
Add official support for Java 20, experimental for Java 21 (#1386)
Update documentation: JDK version 19 is officially supported (#1371)

Upgrade ASM to 9.4 (#1368)

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

Upgrade maven-surefire-plugin to 2.19.1 (#1341)

Starting from version 2.11 maven-surefire-plugin does not ignore
a failure to start forked JVM and causes build failure,
e.g. if there is an exception during JaCoCo agent startup
(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SUREFIRE-780)
Add parameter to include the current project in the aggregated report (#1007)
Make question issue template more explicit
Add experimental support for Java 20 class files (#1335)

  not needed.

and tests pass.

refactor-probeinserter.commit_message:
Refactor re-calculation of stackmap frames

* Try to make code more readable by adding a utility class to track
types and variable positions on locals
* Re-use locals array to avoid object creations

```
HOMEURL=http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco
RUNTIMEPACKAGE=${jacoco.runtime.package.name}
```

after this change produces

```
VERSION=${qualified.bundle.version}
COMMITID=0000000
HOMEURL=http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco
RUNTIMEPACKAGE=${jacoco.runtime.package.name}
```

and tests pass.
Fix build for JDK 21 EA b21 (#1433)
AgentModule should set ProtectionDomain when defining classes (#1425)
Add validation test for JEP 432: Record Patterns (#1415)

Agent should not open `java.lang` package to unnamed module of the application class loader (#1334)

Co-authored-by: Evgeny Mandrikov <mandrikov@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Marc R. Hoffmann <hoffmann@mountainminds.com>

Upgrade spotless-maven-plugin to 2.35.0 and Eclipse JDT Formatter to 4.27 (#1414)

This allows format checking of the integration test targets up to Java 20.
Require at least JDK 11 for the build (#1413)

Upgrade ECJ from 3.12.1 to 3.32.0 (#1404)

Version `4.6.1` of previously used artifact `org.eclipse.jdt:ecj`
was actually version of Eclipse IDE.

This version supports source/target from Java 1.1 up to 19.

Also note that starting from version `3.27.0` ECJ requires Java 11
for execution.
Add validation test for JEP 433: Pattern Matching for switch (#1191)
Both `-Djdk.version=5` and `-Dbytecode.version=5` are required when using JDK >= 9 for Maven
Support targeting JDK 5 when using JDK >= 9 for Maven (#1398)
Add official support for Java 20, experimental for Java 21 (#1386)
Update documentation: JDK version 19 is officially supported (#1371)

Upgrade ASM to 9.4 (#1368)

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

Upgrade maven-surefire-plugin to 2.19.1 (#1341)

Starting from version 2.11 maven-surefire-plugin does not ignore
a failure to start forked JVM and causes build failure,
e.g. if there is an exception during JaCoCo agent startup
(https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SUREFIRE-780)
Add parameter to include the current project in the aggregated report (#1007)
Make question issue template more explicit
Add experimental support for Java 20 class files (#1335)
